Reviews.Title: Overall, yes!
Reviews.Author: Juan M.
Reviews.Content: Overall, yes! ..kind of slow sometimes... but for the price it's a good choice for unlocked/smart/Wi-Fi/touchscreen phone. Phone language is English, manual is in Chinese.

Reviews.Title: same as S 5831
Reviews.Author: Brian H.
Reviews.Content: Compared to the Samsung Galaxy Ace S5830, there is no significant difference. Basically it is an entry level smart phone with 2G network and limited internal memory. This product was made in China, but there no Chinese language input. The headset and microSD card will not be provided when you purchase Phone here, even the phone has the build-in FM radio function. You can spend less money to get the phone without accessories, but with extra order for all those standard items such as （ head set, micro SD card, etc.); or you can spend a little bit more to get the whole set from S 5830 type. Your money and time, your choice.

Reviews.Title: simple phone
Reviews.Author: Santiago Morel Berni
Reviews.Content: easy to use, a little small, is the minimum of the smartphones,  the only downsize is 3g isn't unlocked only 2g

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: victorb
Reviews.Content: After switching from my old phone (a blackberry) this phone is a breeze, It has apps I use all the timeIt's quick and it does everything I need, I love everything about it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Factory Unlocked to GSM Networks
Multi-Touch Screen
Wi-Fi
